attributes.action: Demand for Public Investigation into evidence from Lord James of Blackheath of 16 trillion dollars missing from UK economy
attributes.additional_details: The Demand for a Public Investigation - WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT AND MAINSTREAM MEDIA INVOLVEMENT - into the evidence Lord James of Blackheath brought before the House of Lords on February 16, 2012. 16 trillion dollars is missing from the UK, American people as well as from various other countries around the world. We the people of the United Kingdom demand full disclosure and accountibilty with Immediate effect.  We demand the arrests of the ciminal cabal. We are AWAKE and we will not be lied to any longer..
